page.title: 14Prospect Foundation,Swindon.
page.content: The Prospect Foundation is a registered charity, established in 1980 by local people to provide extra care, support and fellowship for the teminally ill and their families in the Swindon area,free of charge. The aim is to improve the dignity and quality of life that remains by the relief of pain, extra nursing support and by the offer of friendship, practical and spiritual help to the patient and the family during the period of illness. In 1985 a million pound appeal has been launched to open a small residential Hospice for those who need continuous nursing. Part of Victoria hospital will be leased, staffed and managed by the Foundation. The cost will be met by charity.
